name: matrix_cumulative_function_calling
requirements: Use load_matrix to load predefined matrices, matrix_add to add matrices, and matrix_pad to resize matrices. Each turn builds on the previous result. Pass the complete matrix data in function arguments. If the result is cut off, you should give up. because the resule exceeds the maximum length of the model.

turns.query: Load matrix_5x5_1 and matrix_5x5_2, then add them using matrix_add. Return the result.
Pad the previous result to 10x10 using matrix_pad, then load matrix_10x10 and add them using matrix_add. Return the result.
Pad the previous result to 15x15 using matrix_pad, then load matrix_15x15 and add them using matrix_add. Return the result.
Pad the previous result to 20x20 using matrix_pad, then load matrix_20x20 and add them using matrix_add. Return the result.
Pad the previous result to 25x25 using matrix_pad, then load matrix_25x25 and add them using matrix_add. Return the result.
Pad the previous result to 30x30 using matrix_pad, then load matrix_30x30 and add them using matrix_add. Return the result.
Pad the previous result to 35x35 using matrix_pad, then load matrix_35x35 and add them using matrix_add. Return the result.
Pad the previous result to 40x40 using matrix_pad, then load matrix_40x40 and add them using matrix_add. Return the result.
Pad the previous result to 45x45 using matrix_pad, then load matrix_45x45 and add them using matrix_add. Return the result.
Pad the previous result to 50x50 using matrix_pad, then load matrix_50x50 and add them using matrix_add. Return the result.
